plot: An Irish-American girl brings her Jewish boyfriend home for the first time; he wants to get a marriage blessing, but the father's strong Irish-Catholic sensibility combined with a little whiskey may prove too much to handle.
title: The Blessing
plot_es: An Irish-American girl brings her Jewish boyfriend home for the first time; he wants to get a marriage blessing, but the father's strong Irish-Catholic sensibility combined with a little whiskey may prove too much to handle.
plot_en: An Irish-American girl brings her Jewish boyfriend home for the first time; he wants to get a marriage blessing, but the father's strong Irish-Catholic sensibility combined with a little whiskey may prove too much to handle.
